This 2017 Honda Ballade 1.5 Auto is a groovy run-about vehicle, if you looking for a reliability vehicle than this Ballade should be top of your list. It comes with power steering, multi-functioning steering, electric windows, central locking remote, air conditioning, radio/Bluetooth connectivity, reverse camera, front armrest, electric mirrors and paddle shifting. Thank you for choosing Crescent Car Sales. Giving you excellent service is always a pleasure. We are privileged to help you own what you love. We guarantee 100% satisfaction on all products and services from us. Our price excludes additional costs such as license and registration, COR. The mechanical warranty is optional.
